mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.process_name AS "processName", a.match_id AS "matchId", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.self_signup AS "selfSignup", a.has_leaderboard AS "hasLeaderboard", a.eval_docker_image AS "evalDockerImage", a.eval_service AS "evalService", a.eval_docker_command AS "evalDockerCommand", a.columns AS "columns", a.token_start_time AS "tokenStartTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ps_match_process( process_name, match_id, start_time, end_time, project_id, self_signup, has_leaderboard, eval_docker_image, eval_service, eval_docker_command, columns, token_start_time ) VALUES ( #{processName}, #{matchId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{projectId}, #{selfSignup}, #{hasLeaderboard}, #{evalDockerImage}, #{evalService}, #{evalDockerCommand}, #{columns}, #{tokenStartTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ps_match_process SET process_name = #{processName}, match_id = #{matchId}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, project_id = #{projectId}, self_signup = #{selfSignup}, has_leaderboard = #{hasLeaderboard}, eval_docker_image = #{evalDockerImage}, eval_service = #{evalService}, eval_docker_command = #{evalDockerCommand}, columns = #{columns}, token_start_time = #{tokenStartTime} WHERE id = #{id}
